name: Take Over
summary:
英雄联盟2020全球总决赛主题曲。

The action-packed rock anthem is the seventh in a series of annual songs aimed at promoting Riot Games' League of Legends World Championship.

“Take Over” fuses Henry Lau’s origins in K-pop and Mandopop with the pop and rock influences of American singers MAX and Jeremy McKinnon of A Day To Remember.

The song’s release was accompanied by a music video which features cartoon versions of some of the most prominent League of Legends pro players of all time, such as Faker, xPeke and JackeyLove.
info:
• 中文名: 所向无前
  • 版本特性: Digital
  • 发售日期: 2020年9月17日
  • 播放时长: 3:45
  • 录音: Bernie Grundman
  • 艺术家: Jeremy McKinnon (A Day To Remember)、MAX、刘宪华
  • 作词: Riot Music Team, Alex Seaver of Mako, and Cal Scruby
  • 作曲: Riot Music Team, Alex Seaver of Mako, and Cal Scruby
  • 混音: Riot Music Team
  • 母带: Mike Bozzi at Bernie Grundman
  • 音乐制作: Riot Music Team
  • MV制作: Riot Music Team、The Line Animation
